shapeLibraries.//: The name must remain 'scratchboard' to stay consistent with the first published releases.
shapeLibraries.name: scratchboard

settings.name: endpoints
settings.label: Model Endpoints
settings.description: A list of model endpoints that can be accessed by the extension. Currently endpoints implementing either OpenAI's or Azure's chat interface are supported. If you enter an empty array ([]) as the value, you can add endpoints via the panel in the extension. They will need to be configured once per extension installation.
